parameter.name: Description
parameter.defaultValue: Implements a force-directed graph drawing method suited also for very large graphs. It is based on a combination of an efficient multilevel scheme and a strategy for approximating the repusive forcesin the system by rapidly evaluating potential fields.

parameter.name: Reference
parameter.defaultValue: Stefan Hachul, Michael Jünger: Drawing Large Graphs with a Potential-Field-Based Multilevel Algorithm. 12th International Symposium on Graph Drawing 1998, New York (GD '04), LNCS 3383, pp. 285-295, 2004.
